Chilblain.help: Immobilizes your target in an icy trap. Deals some damage over time and slightly Slows the target's attack and movement speed. Useful for keeping villains at bay. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Chilblain.targetHelp: You have been frozen in place. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced and you are freezing.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.

Frozen_Fists.help: Frozen Fists encrusts your hands in ice, giving them the ability to quickly inflict moderate damage on villains. The foe's attack and movement speed is Slowed, due to the chills caused by the cold blows. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Fast
Frozen_Fists.targetHelp: You have been chilled by the Frozen Fists. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Ice_Sword.help: You create a blade of solid ice that deals higher damage then Frozen Fists. Being hit by this Ice Sword will Slow a target's movement and attack speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Sword.targetHelp: You have been chilled by the Ice Sword. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Chilling_Embrace.help: While active, you dramatically lower the temperature around yourself, Slowing the attack rate of all nearby foes, as well as their movement speed and damage. The air around your body becomes so cold that attacks deflect off of it, granting you absorption, while your body becomes extremely energy efficient, granting you bonus Recovery. Recharge: Very Fast
Chilling_Embrace.shortHelp: Toggle: PBAoE, Foe -Recharge, -Speed, -DMG, Self +Absorb over Time, +Recovery
Chilling_Embrace.targetHelp: Your Attack speed, Running speed and damage are reduced by the Chilling Embrace.

Build_Up.help: Greatly boosts your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases chance to hit. Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: You tap into your inner core with your {PowerName} and are more deadly for a short while.

Ice_Patch.help: You emanate a patch of ice around you, which causes foes that step onto it to slip and fall down. This effect lasts until the ice melts. You must be near the ground to activate this power. Recharge: Slow

messages.attackerHit: You freeze the ground underneath you into an {PowerName}!

Shiver.help: You can blast forth a wide cone of chilling air that dramatically Slows the movement and attack rate of nearby foes. Recharge: Slow
Shiver.targetHelp: You are shivering. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced.

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} dramatically Slows the attack speed and movement of {PlayerDest}!

Freezing_Touch.help: This Freezing Touch will encase a single foe in a block of ice. This will deal minor damage as well as freezing them in their tracks, leaving them cold and helpless. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Freezing_Touch.targetHelp: You are frozen solid by the Freezing Touch.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.

Frozen_Aura.help: Your mastery of cold enables you to dramatically lower the temperature immediately around you. Foes near you when you perform a Frozen Aura will be caught in a fragile casing of ice. Frozen foes will break free if attacked. Frozen Aura deals no significant damage. Recharge: Slow
Frozen_Aura.targetHelp: You are hibernating in the Frozen Aura.
